air-jordan-3-valor-blue.name: VALOUR BLUE
air-jordan-3-valor-blue.description:
Deconstruct the past and step into the present with the Nike DBreak-Type. The airy mesh upper and exaggerated stitching add a bold, fresh look onto early Bowerman prototypes pulled from the archives. Retro suede and heel clips designed for support keep you connected to history while the rubber Waffle outsole features flashy angling at the back for a modern look.

  • Shown: Black/Summit White/Anthracite/Menta
  • Style: CJ1156-001

jordan-mars-270-london.name: JORDAN-MARS-270-LONDON
jordan-mars-270-london.description:
Deconstruct the past and step into the present with the Nike DBreak-Type. The airy mesh upper and exaggerated stitching add a bold, fresh look onto early Bowerman prototypes pulled from the archives.   • Shown: Black/Summit White/Anthracite/Menta
  • Style: CJ1156-001

Nike DBreak-Type.name: Nike DBreak-Type
Nike DBreak-Type.description:
Deconstruct the past and step into the present with the Nike DBreak-Type. The airy mesh upper and exaggerated stitching add a bold, fresh look onto early Bowerman prototypes pulled from the archives. LeBron 17 Low.name: LeBron 17 Low
LeBron 17 Low.description:
Fine-tuned for LeBron's ferocious game, the LeBron 17 Low gives the King another sensation to add to his arsenal. The combined cushioning platform provides a balanced mix of impact absorption and responsiveness. A precisely crafted low-top design offers a lightweight, conforming fit with ankle mobility and a look that resonates on the street.

  • Shown: Spruce Aura/Racer Blue/Sail/Black
  • Style: CD5007-005

Nike Air VaporMax Flyknit 3.name: Nike Air VaporMax Flyknit 3
Nike Air VaporMax Flyknit 3.description:
Rebel against gravity in the Nike Air VaporMax Flyknit 3. A high-fashion inspired upper features flowing lines of breathable, stretchable Flyknit construction. The revolutionary VaporMax Air technology underfoot keeps a spring in your step from toe-to-heel.

  • Shown: Iron Grey/Particle Grey/Anthracite/Track Red
  • Style: CT1270-001

Nike Air VaporMax FlyKnit 3 USA.name: Nike Air VaporMax FlyKnit 3 USA
Nike Air VaporMax FlyKnit 3 USA.description:
The Nike Air VaporMax Flyknit 3 USA is revolutionary in more ways than one. The upper features flowing, 2-tone lines of breathable, stretchable Flyknit construction that ramps up the heat while repping the red, white and blue. Plus, VaporMax Air technology keeps spring in your step with toe-to-heel cushioning.

  • Shown: White/University Red/Metallic Silver/Deep Royal Blue
  • Style: CW5585-100

3a891b03-498e-4bab-9d7f-26f4256cdbb9.name: Nike Air Trainer 3
3a891b03-498e-4bab-9d7f-26f4256cdbb9.description:
The Nike Air Trainer 3 was an instant hit with its clean lines, visible Air cushioning in the heel and soft padding around the ankle. This remake combines retro colors, versatile styling options with its unique lacing system and stitched leather overlays, making it a go-to choice for off-court living.

  • Shown: Midnight Navy/White/Vast Grey/University Red
  • Style: CN0923-400

ea371464-9a0d-4ec5-9026-6c32b23c71c1.name: Nike Zoom Fly 3
ea371464-9a0d-4ec5-9026-6c32b23c71c1.description:
Inspired by the Vaporfly, the Nike Zoom Fly 3 gives distance runners race-day comfort and durability. The power of a carbon fiber plate keeps you in the running mile after mile.

  • Shown: White/Spruce Aura/Hyper Violet/Flash Crimson
  • Style: AT8240-103
